name: Recommend a Police Department Audit
description: Department of Police Accountability (DPA) is an oversight agency that investigates complaints about SF Police Officers (SFPO). DPA investigates SFPD officer-involved shootings and audits SFPD practices. We recommend new policies and policy changes to the Police Commission and SFPD. DPA and SFPD are separate agencies that both report to the Police Commission. Services offered: - Policing concerns - File a complaint or request a hearing - Request records of complaints about police Visit the websit
